# size

**Instance Property**

The size of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var size: CGSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting the value of this property also changes the size of the rectangle returned by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes/frame] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes/bounds] properties.

## Accessing the layout attributes

- **frame**: The frame rectangle of the item.
- **bounds**: The bounds of the item.
- **center**: The center point of the item.
- **transform3D**: The 3D transform of the item.
- **transform**: The affine transform of the item.
- **alpha**: The transparency of the item.
- **zIndex**: Specifies the item’s position on the z axis.
- **isHidden**: Determines whether the item is currently displayed.
